Author: snefferu
Text: I’ve always been a “lightweight” with alcohol, but being underweight makes me even more sensitive to it. I can get pretty tipsy from one glass, and really quite drunk from two!

Author: moonxwitch
Text: yeah i’ve noticed that the smaller i am, the less i can drink. i assume this is why men’s recommended alcohol servings are more than women’s, because on average they’re bigger?   but also it really depends on how much you’ve eaten before drinking, if i drink on an empty stomach i can literally get drunk on 1/8 of what it usually takes me
